gold.user: Alice is a software developer who frequently works on open-source projects. She wants to explore the commonly used licenses to choose the best one for her new project.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of commonly used licenses with their details.

gold.user: Bob is a project manager who needs to understand the MIT license for a new application his team is developing. He wants to read the full text and conditions of the license.
gold.ideal: Returns the details and full text of the MIT license.

gold.user: Charlie is a contributor to Alice's GitHub repository. He wants to check the license type of the repository to ensure compliance with its terms before submitting his contributions.
gold.ideal: Returns the license information for Alice's repository, including the license type and its details.
